GeneralExplanationGrp.IdentifierTxt: REPORTABLE SERVICES PROVIDED TO THE FOUNDATION
GeneralExplanationGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990 PF PART VIII PAGE 6 LINE 1
GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION PAID GIVEN & COMPANY, AN ACCOUNTANCY CORPORATION, THE SUM OF $65,882 FOR VARIOUS MANAGEMENT SERVICES PERFORMED BY ITS EMPLOYEES. THESE SERVICES INCLUDED TAX PREPARATION, BOOKKEEPING, FINANCIAL SERVICES, REVIEWING GRANTS TO QUALIFYING CHARITIES, AND GENERAL FOUNDATION MANAGEMENT SERVICES. ROBERT H. GIVEN, AN OFFICER AND DIRECTOR OF THE FOUNDATION, IS AN EMPLOYEE OF GIVEN & COMPANY AND AS AN EMPLOYEE RECEIVED COMPENSATION FOR HIS SERVICES ON FOUNDATION MATTERS. NO COMPENSATION WAS PAID BY THE FOUNDATION TO ITS OFFICERS OR DIRECTORS.
